title: How do I find jobs on Unity Connect?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I wish to know how to find jobs on Unity Connect 
  • I am a Contractor looking for work

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to search for specific jobs that suit your skills, or for particular jobs that you have heard are available on Unity Connect.

sections.title: Resolution
content: To find the list of vacant jobs on the Unity Connect site, simply go to the 'Jobs' section and browse the jobs that match your skills!
You are able to 'Apply', 'Skip', or 'Save' jobs for later!
1. If you are a Unity Connect member, you can sign in here.
You can then use the search bar to search for particular jobs, as well as, refine your search by Location, Skills, Experience Level, Client History or Job Type.
